
                
                <p></p><div class="genxin">3个肯德基蛋挞，6.8<br><br>支付宝 首页 卡券包 下拉找到图一<a href="http://dpurl.cn/1g5fIXcz" target="_blank" class="infotextkey">美团</a>6-2美团团购券<br>点去使用，搜索“肯德基” 买3个派，券后6.8<br>肯德基APP或小程序，卡券包，点去使用，选肯悦餐厅，会提示图四<br>下单的时候（图五）右上角切换到附近的肯德基即可 <br><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx4.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hz619j6f7oj30xh1fi0za.jpg" src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx4.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hz619j6f7oj30xh1fi0za.jpg" class="qr-image"><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx3.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hz619kifzgj30xh0n9afz.jpg" src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx3.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hz619kifzgj30xh0n9afz.jpg" class="qr-image"><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx3.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hz619wybdmj30xh181tft.jpg" src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx3.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hz619wybdmj30xh181tft.jpg" class="qr-image"><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hz61acth5sj30xh19r0wn.jpg" src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hz61acth5sj30xh19r0wn.jpg" class="qr-image"><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hz61bxpwptj30lk0q9jvp.jpg" src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/006h4av2gy1hz61bxpwptj30lk0q9jvp.jpg" class="qr-image"></div><p></p>
